name: Bellossom

ability.name: Heal Dance
ability.effect: If Bellossom is your Active Pokemon, once per turn, remove 1 damage counter from each of your Pokemon.

attacks.name: Full Bloom
attacks.effect: Deal 20 more damage for each Bellossom in play (including this one).

flavor: The intense sun dispersed Gloom's gloom and led it to a life of dancing and socializing.
